title: Core 60s loop with Trust meter
summary: Implement one-map prototype where the run lasts 60 seconds unless Trust reaches 0.
acceptance: Player can move and use one action button
Trust meter is visible at all times
Run ends on timeout or Trust <= 0

title: OpenClaw ping system
summary: Add WARN, SAFE, and RISK pings with cooldown and clear VFX.
acceptance: Each ping has distinct color and icon
Pings are time-limited and have cooldown
Following a correct ping increases Trust

title: First 10-second visual punch
summary: Create gripping visual style for startup and first wave.
acceptance: Threat telegraphs are readable in under 1 second
No stutter on base Mac mini target

title: Shareable end card
summary: Show score, trust streak, daily seed, and funny fail reason.
acceptance: End card appears after every run
